Direct mode means you want to use your s:
‚û°Ô∏è Direct: Select this mode if you configure your domain exclusively on your DNS provider in DNS-only mode. (CDN or Proxy Mode Off)
üîô Old Direct Mode: This mode is similar to Direct mode but does not utilize gRPC for communication. Select Old Mode if you prefer to configure your domain on your DNS provider in DNS-only mode without utilizing gRPC.
üîÄ CDN: Select this mode if you use a CDN provider for your server's domain. (Proxy Mode On)
‚òëÔ∏è Automatic CDN IP Selector: This mode functions similarly to CDN mode but with an automated IP assignment based on the IP provided by ircf.space. In Auto CDN IP mode, the IP address is resolved from the domain, while in CDN mode, the domain is returned.
‚ôæÔ∏è Relay: Select this mode if you are using one or more Intermediary servers. Read More
‚ú¥Ô∏è Cloudflare Worker: This mode enables automatic creation of workers for your domain in Cloudflare. Simplify the setup and management of workers by registering this domain, as the necessary steps for worker registration are handled automatically within Cloudflare.
üîÇ Reality: Utilize the Reality protocol to create multiple domains.
üÜé Fake Site: Select this mode if you want to use a fake Domain (e.g., Soft98.ir) to bypass SNI whitelist Proxy. (Not Recommended)
Domain (%(domain)s)-> IP=%(domain_ip)s i: Domain (%(domain)s)-> IP = %(domain_ip)s is not same as your IP = %(server_ip)s . this is required in Direct Mode
Domain IP=%(domain_ip)s is not matched w: Domain IP=%(domain_ip)s is not matched with your ip=%(server_ip)s which is required in direct mode
Domain can not be resolved! there is a p: Domain can not be resolved! There is a problem in your domain. Please check your Domain configurations.

Donation.description:
‚ú≥Ô∏è We need your help In Developing this Project
If you are developer or content producer, please contact us at info@hiddify.com

‚ÑπÔ∏è Also, we need financial help to further develop this panel and our service (we are Non-Profit).
Payment Methods :
  • TON
  • USDT (TRC20)
  • Litecoin
  • Ethereum
  • Bitcoin
  • Dogecoin

We need also other help:

  • üìùPython Developer
  • üìùSwift Developer
  • üìùFlutter Developer
  • üìùGo Developer
  • üñ•Content Providers
Please contact us at info@hiddify.com if you can help us.

Premium Description:
Hiddify Manager Is Made For Non-Commercial Use. But If You Use This Panel Commercially, Please Help The Project Grow By Donating.
In Exchange For Your Financial Support, We Also Provide Special Facilities For Your Commercial Product.

Such as:
  • The Possibility Of Syncing To Cloudflare: That Is, By Adding a Domain In The Panel, The Relevant Settings Can Also Be Made In Cloudflare
  • Possibility Of Displaying Your Brand In The Panel
  • Possibility Of Using The Central Panel To Manage More Than 1 Server In Just One Panel, So It Is No Longer Necessary To Register Users In Different Servers, And Their Volume Will Be Collected In All Servers.
  • The Possibility Of Using The Telegram Bot
  • Ability To Change Proxy Names
Please Contact @HiddifyCommercial After Donating. Send a Message To Get a Special Version for business users.

cdn_forced_host.description: In this part you can use a set of specific domains or IPs for your server to be override in the user links. If you use this template , the relevant IP will be selected according to the user's operator, and if you put a range of IPs The IP will be randomly selected from that range. core_type.description:
‚ò¢Ô∏è XRay : Is a Complete Core
üì¶ Singbox : Developed by SagerNet. It is also a good core

country.description: It applies the appropriate settings for each country according to the filtering conditions of that country
country.label: üåç Country

decoy_domain.description:
Fake Site: simulates a site when someone visits your domain directly.
‚ö†Ô∏è Do not use financial, Iranian and famous sites or sites with login such as Google, Yahoo, Wikipedia, PayPal.
‚õî Be sure to check the site and make sure that it is the right site, otherwise you may receive a phishing warning.
‚õî‚õî Check this domain again so that there is no problem in the future
decoy_domain.label: üì∫ Decoy Site

domain_fronting.description: It is used to simulate another website instead of your website in SNI. therefore, GFW can not filter your Domain Guide. ‚ö†Ô∏èCloudFlare does not support Domain Fronting.
domain_fronting.label: üîí TLS Domain Fronting

domain_fronting_domain.description: It is used to simulate another website instead of your website in SNI. therefore, GFW Can not filter your domain.
domain_fronting_domain.label: ‚ÑπÔ∏è Domain Fronting

domain_fronting_http_enable.description: Enabling HTTP Domain Fronting causes your domain to be block quickly.
domain_fronting_http_enable.label: HTTP Domain Fronting

domain_fronting_tls_enable.description: In CloudFlare, TLS Domain Fronting is not supported. it will use Port 443 to connect to CDN
domain_fronting_tls_enable.label: üîí TLS Domain Fronting

firewall.description: Enabling Firewall will open used Ports (at least 22,443,80 and SSH) and close all other Ports
firewall.label: üõ°Ô∏è Firewall

grpc_enable.description: gRPC is a modern open source high performance Remote Procedure Call (RPC) framework. It can be used in supported CDNs
grpc_enable.label: ‚ûø gRPC

http.description: HTTP Configurations could be set in this section
http.label: HTTP Configuration

http_ports.description: Comma separated integers indicating the ports to use as Unencrypted connections (Port 80 will be used In anycase)
http_ports.label: üîé HTTP Ports

http_proxy_enable.description: By allowing this, your users can connect to the system with Unencrypted HTTP Port. (Not Recommended)
http_proxy_enable.label: ‚òëÔ∏è Allow HTTP Connection

httpupgrade_enable.description:
HTTPUpgrade complete a HTTP 1.1 Upgrade request and response before using the connection directly. It is similar to WebSocket in the way it create an direction channel that can be forwarded by many reverse proxies and CDNs, without the need to deal with all the issue around WebSocket Protocol itself.
‚ö†Ô∏è Not Available in Xray based Clients. Only HiddifyNext, Singbox, and V2fly clients are supported. (Read More)
httpupgrade_enable.label: üÜô HTTPUpgrade Method

hysteria.description: Hysteria is a feature-packed proxy & relay tool optimized for lossy, unstable connections (e.g. satellite networks, congested public Wi-Fi, connecting to foreign servers from China)
hysteria.label: Hysteria

hysteria_enable.description: To Enable UDP based Hysteria Protocol
hysteria_enable.label: ‚ö´Ô∏è Hysteria2

kcp_ports.label: KCP Ports

license.description: For commercial use of this Product, you must Purchase its License

mux.description: MUX (Multiplex) configurations could be set in this section

mux_enable.description: Mux needs compatible clients. Mux in Hiddify Next and Singbox are not compatible with XRay. (Read More)
mux_enable.label: ‚ìÇÔ∏è MUX (‚ö†Ô∏è Incompatible With Some Clients)

mux_max_connections.description: Maximum Connections. Conflict with Max Streams

mux_max_streams.description: Maximum Multiplexed streams in a connection before opening a new connection

mux_min_streams.description: Minimum Multiplexed streams in a connection before opening a new connection
mux_min_streams.label: ‚ÜòÔ∏è MUX Min Streams

‚ûñ h2Mux: Multiplexing Streams Over HTTP/2
mux_protocol.label: ‚ôçÔ∏è MUX Protocol

netdata.description: For displaying resources. uses your Server's CPU but it is not too much.
netdata.label: Netdata

package_mode.description: Specify whether you want Released Package or Beta one
package_mode.label: üîÑ Package Update Mode

parent_panel.description: You can Connect to the Central Panel to define only one user and the usage of all Servers will be added cumulatively.
parent_panel.label: Parent Panel (Multi Server)

path_splithttp.description: This option defines the Path for Split HTTP
path_splithttp.label: ‚ÑπÔ∏è Path for Split HTTP

proxy_path.description: We use secret proxy path to hide our proxies for the gouvernment
proxy_path.label: ‚ÑπÔ∏è Secret Proxy Path

proxy_path_admin.description: We use secret proxy path to hide our proxies for the governments and  bots
proxy_path_admin.label: üîê Proxy Path for Admins

proxy_path_client.description: Secret proxy path hide the proxies from the governments and bots
proxy_path_client.label: üîè Proxy Path for Clients

reality.description: REALITY eliminate the Server-Side TLS Fingerprint Feature
reality.label: Reality

reality_fallback_domain.description: When the GFW visit the Websites in Server names, it will be redirect to this Domain.
reality_fallback_domain.label: üåç Reality Fallback Domain

reality_port.description: You can set a customized port for your reality server to reduce the system's overhead. (Allow direct connection to proxies should be yes)
reality_port.label: ‚ÜîÔ∏è  Direct Reality Port

reality_server_names.description: You can add several Sever Names in comma seperated format
reality_server_names.label: üåé Reality Server Names

shadowsocks.description: Shadowsocks is a fast tunnel proxy that helps you bypass firewalls
shadowsocks.label: Shadowsocks

shadowsocks2022_enable.description: Shadowsocks 2022 is a secure Proxy Protocol for TCP and UDP traffic. The proxy traffic is indistinguishable from a random byte stream, and therefore can circumvent firewalls and Internet censors that rely on DPI (Deep Packet Inspection)
shadowsocks2022_enable.label: ‚≠ïÔ∏è Shadowsocks 2022

shadowsocks2022_method.description: This method also used in ShadowTLS and SSFakeTLS
shadowsocks2022_method.label: üîê Shadowsocks Encrypytion Method

shadowsocks2022_port.description: It needs both UDP and TCP to be Free
shadowsocks2022_port.label: ‚ÜîÔ∏è Shadowsocks 2022 Port

shadowtls.description:
A Proxy to expose real tls handshake to the firewall.

It works like TROJAN but It does not require signing certificate. the firewall will see real tls handshake with valid certificate that you choose.
shadowtls.label: ShadowTLS

shadowtls_enable.description: ShadowTLS Is a new Protocol but it can hide the traffic from the government using FakeTLS
shadowtls_enable.label: ‚òëÔ∏è ShadowTLS

shadowtls_fakedomain.description: Please use a well known domain in your data center. for example, If you are In azure data center, microsoft-update.com Is a good example
shadowtls_fakedomain.label: üåç ShadowTLS Fake Domain

shared_secret.description: Some Proxies don't support Accounting currently so we have to use a secret for them
shared_secret.label: üîê Shared Secret

show_usage_in_sublink.description: This option creates a Fake Config in the user's sub link that shows the user's remaining volume
show_usage_in_sublink.label: üëÅÔ∏è‚Äçüó®Ô∏è Show Usage in Sublink

speed_test.description: Allow your users to do Speed Test. It helps them to identify the link quality
speed_test.label: üöÄ Speed Test

splithttp_enable.description: This Protocol send and receive information in individual channels
splithttp_enable.label: üàÅ Split HTTP

ssfaketls.description: Shadowsocks FakeTLS is a simple obfusacting tool that encapsulate the date In tls packet
ssfaketls.label: Shadowsocks FakeTLS

ssfaketls_enable.description: Simple OBFS Protocol is Not Recommended
ssfaketls_enable.label: üÜé Shadowsocks FakeTLS (Simple OBFS)

ssfaketls_fakedomain.description: Please use a well known domain in your data center. for example, If you are in Azure data center, microsoft-update.com Is a good example
ssfaketls_fakedomain.label: üåç SS FakeTLS FakeDomain

ssh.description: ‚ÑπÔ∏è An SSH proxy, also known as an SSH tunnel or SSH port forwarding, is a secure method of creating a secure communication channel between two machines over an insecure network. We have a specific application which is completely different from SSH server and can not execute any commands
ssh.label: SSH Proxy

ssh_server_enable.description: SSH Proxy is completely different than original SSH Server
ssh_server_enable.label: ‚úîÔ∏è SSH Proxy

ssh_server_port.description: This is completely different from your original SSH server. It is a dedicated program.
ssh_server_port.label: ‚ÜîÔ∏è SSH Proxy Port

ssr.description: ShadowsocksR is a fork of the original Shadowsocks project, claimed to be superior in terms of security and stability.

ssr_fakedomain.label: SSR FakeDomain

enter code 0123456789ABCDEF0123456789ABCDEF in that bot.

telegram_fakedomain.label: üì∫ Telegram Fake Domain

telegram_lib.description: You can switch between different Telegram Libraries. Please note that only Python works in all servers, others may have some issue. Test Proxy after changing it
telegram_lib.label: üî¢  Telegram Proxy Library

tls.description: TLS Configurations could be set in this section
tls.label: TLS Settings

tls_fragment_enable.description: Under some circumstances, it can bypass the SNI blacklist system. (Read More)
tls_fragment_enable.label: ‚èØ TLS Fragment

tls_mixed_case.description: Enables TLS Mixed SNI Case Fragmentation
tls_mixed_case.label: üî† TLS Mixed SNI Case

tls_padding_enable.description: Enables Padding for TLS Fragmentation. (Read More)
tls_padding_enable.label: ‚ôíÔ∏è TLS Padding

tls_padding_length.description: The length of the Padding for TLS Fragmentation
tls_padding_length.label: üìè TLS Padding

Delicately-TUICed High-Performance proxy is on top of the QUIC protocol. 

TUIC's goal is to minimize the handshake latency as much as possible

utls.description: This Option Will Simulate Different Browsers, Therefore, GFW Can Not Detect Your Browsing
utls.label: ‚ùáÔ∏è uTLS

v2ray_enable.description: V2ray does not support accounting and not suggested

config.validation-error: There is an error in one of the fields.

warp.description:
Warp is a tool that hides your server IP in outbound traffic. It means if the users are visiting a website the Warp IP is exposed instead of our server IP.
For example, if you have a problem with captcha on Google, it might be fixed this way.
warp.label: WARP‚ûï

warp_enable.description: WARP helps you bypass Google, Spotify and Netflix restrictions by hiding server IP
warp_enable.label: Enables WARP+

warp_mode.description:
‚ú¥Ô∏è All : All Sites use Warp IPs in outbound
‚òëÔ∏è Only Domestic and Blocked Sites: Only Domestic Sites and websites like Google, Spotify, Netflix, OpenAi, IPinfo.io use Warp IPs in outbound
warp_mode.label: ‚ú¥Ô∏è WARP+ Mode

warp_plus_code.description:
üîù Increases browsing speed. To get the Key, go to the 1.1.1.1 app and purchase the original KEY from Cloudflare
‚ö†Ô∏è If there is an error in this Key, the WARP will be disabled
warp_plus_code.label: üîë Warp Plus Key

warp_sites.description: Add additional sites to pass through WARP (only when warp mode is not None)
warp_sites.label: üÜö Additional WARP Sites

wireguard.description: WireGuard is a lightweight, UDP  based protocol known for its simplicity, efficiency, and strong security. It offers quick setup, transparent code, and has gained popularity for its ease of use across various operating systems
wireguard.label: WireGuard

wireguard_enable.description: WireGuard is UDP based protocol. (‚ö†Ô∏è It is Working In Hiddify Next)
wireguard_enable.label: üêâ WireGuard

wireguard_noise_trick.description: This method introduces extra noise to prevent detection and blocking by the GFW

android.intro:
Please install Hiddify Android from %(dl_link)s %(play_link)s.
Why Hiddify Android?
Hiddify Android is an Open Source Fork Of Clash That Supports More Protocols.
It's Source Codes Exist in GitHub.
Therefore, it is safe.
Alternative: Normal Clash
Clash in Google Play
Direct Download
Clash does not support VLess protocol. therefore, we need to add another link for it.

all_sites.description:
Use Proxy for all websites even for local websites.
Loading local sites will be slower and will endanger your privacy.
all_sites.title: Proxy for All Sites

foreign_sites.description:
Use Proxy for all foreign sites (even not blocked ones).
This mode is useful in accessing some sanctaioned sites.
foreign_sites.title: Foreign Sites Proxy

speedtest.intro: First, Test the Speed without the proxy. If the speed is not good, it means that this ip is so called dirty on your ISP. If the speed was low without a proxy, don't waste your time to test this proxy. Otherwise, test with different proxies of this site and if the speed is similar to the speed without the proxy, then you have found the best protocol.
speedtest.title: Speed Test (Detect dirty IP)

telegram.description: Click on one of the following link then, in the telegram you can see a window that contains Connect Proxy. Click on it and it will work.

doh.help:
Configure DoH on your browser

There are several browsers compatible with DNS over HTTPS (DoH). This protocol lets you encrypt your connection to 1.1.1.1 in order to protect your DNS queries from privacy intrusions and tampering. Some browsers might already have this setting enabled.
‚Äã‚ÄãMozilla Firefox
Select the menu button > Settings.In the General menu, scroll down to access Network Settings. Select Settings. Select Enable DNS over HTTPS.
‚Äã
‚ÄãGoogle Chrome
Select the three-dot menu in your browser > Settings. Select Privacy and security > Security. Scroll down and enable Use secure DNS.
‚Äã‚ÄãMicrosoft Edge
Select the three-dot menu in your browser > Settings. Select Privacy, Search, and Services, and scroll down to Security. Enable Use secure DNS. Select Choose a service provider.
doh.title: DNS Over HTTPS

windows.intro:
First, download and install the Hiddify Desktop software according to your operating system.
%(hiddify_desktop_links)s
Why Hiddify Desktop ?
Hiddify Desktop is an safe and open source fork of Clash that supports more VLESS and UTLS Fingerprinting.

Its source codes exist in GitHub.
Alternative: Normal Clash %(normal_clash_link)s
Clash does not support browser fingerprinting and VLESS protocol . Therefore, we need to add another link for it.

Now, according to your need, you can click on one of the buttons. By viewing the window in your browser, just click on the Open option to automatically add the server link to Hiddify Desktop.
